sentence.Network_en: Ouch! You trod on my toe!
sentence.Network_cn: 哎哟！你踩着我的脚指头了！

sentence.Network_en: " Good Heavens! " and " Ouch ! " are interjections.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 天哪! ” 和 “ 哎哟 ” 都是感叹词.

derivation.yuyuan_name: natural exclamation: first recorded in English in the mid 17th cent

entry.def: 'Ouch!' is used in writing to represent the noise that people make when they suddenly feel pain.

example.ex: She was barefoot and stones dug into her feet. 'Ouch, ouch,' she cried.
example.tran: 她光着脚被石头硌到了。“哎哟，哎哟，”她大声叫着。
